Uses of Class
de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen.Letter

  • Packages that use Letter 
    Package Description
    de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen  

    • Uses of Letter in de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen

      Methods in de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen that return Letter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Letter[] DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getLetters()
      Returns the letters that will be returned via DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getSupportedCharacters() and DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getProbability(char).
      Letter Letter.probability(double newProbability)
      Sets the probability of the character.
      Methods in de.slothsoft.random.types.wordgen with parameters of type Letter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.addLetters(Letter... addedLetters)
      Adds some letters that will be returned via DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getSupportedCharacters() and DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getProbability(char).
      DefaultWordGeneratorConfig DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.letters(Letter... newSupportedLetters)
      Sets the letters that will be returned via DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getSupportedCharacters() and DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getProbability(char).
      void DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.removeLetters(Letter... removedLetters)
      Removes some letters that will not be returned via DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getSupportedCharacters() and DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getProbability(char) any longer.
      void DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.setSupportedLetters(Letter... supportedLetters)
      Sets the letters that will be returned via DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getSupportedCharacters() and DefaultWordGeneratorConfig.getProbability(char).
